```{r av length}
library(stringr)
data(sentences)
mean(nchar(unique(unlist(sentences))))

```

```{r sentences with letter z}
length(grep('z', (unique(unlist(sentences)))))
```
```{r fraction of sentences with as alone}
length(grep(' as ', (unique(unlist(sentences))))) / length(unique(unlist(sentences)))

```

```{r sentences starting with t}
length(grep('^T', (unique(unlist(sentences)))))
```
